title: Part One: Kaiser Wilhelm: The Saddest Warlord In History
itunes:title: Part One: Kaiser Wilhelm: The Saddest Warlord In History
description:
In Episode 97, Robert is joined by Jamie Loftus to discuss Kaiser Wilhelm.


FOOTNOTES:

  1. Kaiser Wilhelm
  2. HOW KAISER WILHELM II CHANGED EUROPE FOREVER
  3. The Kaiser and the First World War
  4. What Happens When a Bad-Tempered, Distractible Doofus Runs an Empire?
  5. Kaiser Wilhelm Ii: A Concise Life
  6. Kaiser Wilhelm II: Germany's Last Emperor 
  7. The Sleepwalkers: How Europe Went to War in 1914 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
